item.additional_enchantments.shard_arrow: This is a dummy item with no use, which should not be obtainable
enchantment.additional_enchantments.expl: Causes an explosion on projectile impact
enchantment.additional_enchantments.fast: Increases the attack speed of weapons
enchantment.additional_enchantments.homi: Projectiles home in to their target
enchantment.additional_enchantments.plag: Attacks inflict the target with Plague
enchantment.additional_enchantments.shat: Allows the usage of Amethyst Shard as arrows which may explode on impact, dealing area damage
enchantment.additional_enchantments.stra: Projectiles are not affected by gravity and have a chance to hit Enderman
enchantment.additional_enchantments.with: Attacks inflict the target with Wither
enchantment.additional_enchantments.perc: Outlines nearby entities and distinguishes them by color
enchantment.additional_enchantments.conf: Has a chance to cause the attacked target to retaliate against a nearby entity, dropping you as a target
enchantment.additional_enchantments.ore_: Outlines nearby ore blocks and distinguishes them by color based on their rarity group
enchantment.additional_enchantments.hunt: Causes you to become invisible, gaining hunter stacks while within plant related blocks - attacks will deal increased critical damage at maximum stacks, using them up
enchantment.additional_enchantments.brac: You are more resistant to knock backs and you will automatically break blocks which slow you down (e.g. cobwebs)
enchantment.additional_enchantments.hydr: You will deal increased damage if the target is on fire, weak to water, in water or if it is raining at the position - when throwing the trident there is a chance to cause a lightning strike
enchantment.additional_enchantments.void: Certain terrain blocks will no longer drop their block as loot
effect.additional_enchantments.plague.de: Deals Magic damage and afflicted targets may spread this debuff - damage, tick rate and spread chance scale with level
effect.additional_enchantments.wither.de: Deals Wither damage - damage and tick rate scale with level
